name: Xorcom
tag_list: telephony, asterisk, open-source, business, communication, ip-pbx, pbx, phone-systems, smb, sme
overview:
Xorcom is a privately-held IP-PBX manufacturer. Xorcom harnesses the power of AsteriskÂ® Open Source IP-PBX â€“ the most rapidly growing telephony platform in the world â€“ to design and produce leading-edge hardware telephony solutions for commercial installations. All Xorcom products feature easy-to-use, reliable, high-bandwidth and high-density USB 2 technology and support all the main analog and digital telephony interfaces, including FXS, FXO, E1/T1 PRI, E1 R2 and BRI ISDN. Today, Xorcom offers the widest and most flexible range of solutions and hardware platforms in the Asterisk market. System integrators, telecom equipment manufacturers, and customer premise telephony and VoIP providers use Xorcom products to provide added value to their end users.
Xorcom engineers are part of the worldwide Asterisk development team and cooperate with the main players in this field. The Xorcom driver (xpp-Xorcom Peripheral Protocol) has been a standard component in the DAHDI (formerly Zaptel) package since Asterisk version 1.2.4, released in Feb. 2006.
Xorcom sells its products via a worldwide distribution channel and OEM partners.
